Body: I have a Samsung Galaxy S5 that has a shattered screen. It doesn't unlock, but the phone works fine. I purchased a new phone, and I want to transfer all my contents from the old phone to the new phone.The problem is the phone is locked with a pattern, and I cannot accesses it as the screen is broken. Does anyone know how to access it?
Title: How to unlock a Samung Galaxy S5 locked with a pattern on a broken screen

history.Text: I have a broken S5 the screen is completely shattered and it doesn't turn on its just all black, but the phone it self works it powers on and everything. I got a new phone and i want to be able to transfer all my things from the old phone to the new phone all pictures music texts all that stuff. But my only problem is the phone is locked it has a pattern on it and i can not accesses it. Does anyone know how to access it?? Please help!!
